Description.p: Identifies the type of requested message content. Transfers within P1R2 are all intended to convey the entire record (to the extent available on the sending system). Therefore one value is applicable at this time.
The default OID for the SNOMED CT code values below is: 2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.15

concept.displayName: Changes since last communication originator & recipient
Entries to the record made between specified dates
